# [Interview #874: Twitter 2013 (WoT), Entry #58](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=874#58)

#### [Jade Kazmierski (23 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/jadekaz/status/294190647525654528)

Now that it's finished, when you close your eyes, and see Rand five years in his future, what do you see?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/294204880225193984)

I see him happy.
